templatesTab.heading: Configure templates
templatesTab.descriptionP1: With Outlook add-in templates you can define which email attribute will be mapped to which field of the "Create new issue" screen in Outlook.
templatesTab.descriptionP2: If you need more flexibility, you can enable multiple contexts e.g. for specific projects.

appLink.description: To allow the Outlook add-in to connect to Jira in a secure way, it is strongly recommended to use an Application Link. Please check our documentation, in case you have doubts or need help.
appLink.configuredCorrectly: The Application Link is configured correctly.
appLink.notConfiguredCorrectly: The Application Link is not configured correctly!
appLink.copyUrlText: Please copy the following URL and use it to create a new Application Link.

addInInstructions.heading: Outlook add-in instructions
addInInstructions.description: The app provides two different types of Outlook add-ins based on different technologies and requirements. To use Jira functionality in Outlook, you'll need to install one of the following add-ins in your Outlook.
addInInstructions.dialogDescription: Please choose your environment to determine the most fitting Outlook add-in version.

standardAddin.description: The Office add-in works on all modern versions of Outlook, across all devices - Windows, MacOS, Web & mobile. It's easier to deploy and more stable - works best with Office 365 / Microsoft 365. Please check the documentation for detailed technical requirements.
standardAddin.probablyCompatibleDescription: According to Microsoft, your environment should be compatible, but we have customers who had issues with it. Our advice: Just try if it works, otherwise please use the other add-in.

comAddin.description: The classic version of our add-in. It uses a native technology and is only available for Windows. It is a .exe/.msi that needs to be installed on every computer. It contains all of the features of the Office add-in, but supports older Outlook versions as well (2010 and later).

delegatedMailboxesTab.projectDescription: Mailboxes configured here can be selected as a sender when sending an email.
delegatedMailboxesTab.projectOnBehalfOfExplanation: This uses the same logic as if the "From" field is changed in Outlook and requires the correct permissions to be granted. For more information on these permissions see {link}.
delegatedMailboxesTab.globalDescription: Mailboxes configured here can be selected as a sender when sending an email.
delegatedMailboxesTab.globalOnBehalfOfExplanation: This uses the same logic as if the "From" field is changed in Outlook and requires the correct permissions to be granted. For more information on these permissions see {link}.
delegatedMailboxesTab.adminSettingOnlyTooltip: This mailbox can only be edited in the admin settings

commentVisibility.choose: Choose if a comment should be added to the issue
commentVisibility.tooltipExplanation: Choose if a comment should be added

sharing.privateDescription: Only I can see this conversation
sharing.azureTenantDescription: Every {{user}} in my organization can see this conversation
sharing.atlassianCloudDescription: Every {{user}} with access to this issue can see this conversation
sharing.sectionTitle: Choose who should be able to see this conversation
sharing.triggerTooltip: Choose who should be able to see this conversation

sendLater.sectionTitle: Choose a time for the email to be sent
sendLater.description: You can decide to send the email at a later time. It will be saved as a draft and sent at the specified time automatically by Outlook.
sendLater.triggerTooltip: Choose a time for the email to be sent

sharingSettingsTab.sharingDescription: Your users can send emails from Jira and share their Outlook conversations.
sharingSettingsTab.autoDetected: It has been automatically enabled, as we detected you are using Microsoft 365.
sharingSettingsTab.readyForAutoDetect: It will be enabled automatically when we detect Microsoft 365.

userDefaultsTab.heading: Configure user defaults
userDefaultsTab.addToIssueDescription: When adding to an issue, what should be filled into the comment?
userDefaultsTab.createIssueDescription: When creating an issue, what should be filled into the description?
userDefaultsTab.preselectProjectIssueType: Preselect last used project and issuetype
userDefaultsTab.showServiceDeksPortalFields: Show tab 'Portal fields' for Jira Service Management projects
userDefaultsTab.createIssueSuccessScreenEnabled: Show success screen after creating an issue
userDefaultsTab.oldEditor: Disable WYSIWYG Editor and use markup instead
userDefaultsTab.userDefaultsDescription: Configure the settings a new user will get by default when first installing our Outlook add-in. This will only affect new users when adding this Jira instance as their first instance. Each user can then adjust these settings for his personal preferences.

prefillOptionLabel.wholeEmail: Always fill in the full email
prefillOptionLabel.preferUniqueEmail: Only fill in the latest reply (or the full email if not possible)

technicalSettingsTab.heading: Configure general settings
technicalSettingsTab.remoteDebug: Allow recording of the screen for debug purposes. This always has to be activated manually by the user and only lasts for a single session.
technicalSettingsTab.technicalSettingsDescription: Configure the settings for any user connecting our Outlook add-in to this instance. This will affect all users after a few reloads of our Outlook add-in.
technicalSettingsTab.privacyDescription: Disabling these options will severely impact our troubleshooting capabilities.
technicalSettingsTab.performanceDescription: Disabling these options might reduce the request load on your Jira instance.

emptyState.noAdminEmptyState: You need admin permissions to view this page

graphLoginScreen.header: Welcome to Outlook Email for Jira
graphLoginScreen.description: Looks like you are using this feature for the very first time. Please login with your Microsoft 365 account to get started!

officeLoginMSALScreen.heading: Re-authenticate Microsoft login
officeLoginMSALScreen.descriptionFirstLine: You need to re-authenticate. This is probably caused by your browser settings.
officeLoginMSALScreen.docLink: Show me how to fix this

sharePermissionType.public: Everybody with access to this issue
sharePermissionType.atlassianCloud: Every logged-in user with access to this issue
sharePermissionType.azureTenant: Everybody in my company with access to this issue
sharePermissionType.heading: Who should be able to see this?

shareObjectTypeSettings.heading: What do you want to share?

conversationScreen.noMailEmptyStateWithLoginHint: This issue has no related emails you are allowed to see. There might be private mails here. You might see more if you login with Microsoft.
conversationScreen.noMailEmptyStateDescription: This issue has no related emails or none you are allowed to see.

messageComponent.sendLaterDate: This message is scheduled to send on

comment.subject: Subject:
comment.imageRemoved: Please open the email to see this image
comment.emailAddedPhrase: An email has been sent for this issue:

helpTab.checkDocHint: It's always a good idea to check out our documentation first, we try to answer common questions there. Use the quick links below to get started!
helpTab.contactUsDescription: In case you need technical help or just want to learn about our product, we are happy to help!

userNotificationsTab.heading: Notification settings
userNotificationsTab.previewDescriptionOverflow: The text might overflow differently based on the users' dialog width.
userNotificationsTab.previewDescriptionTruncation: The text might be truncated differently based on the users' dialog width.
userNotificationsTab.description: Set the information to be shown to users in the Outlook add-in. This can be overwritten in the project specific settings for each project.
userNotificationsTab.projectDescription: Set the information to be shown to users in the Outlook add-in. This overwrites the global settings.
userNotificationsTab.noProjectSettingsDescription: There are no project specific settings overwriting the global default.

errorMessages.createDraftMessage: This feature requires an Exchange Online mailbox. If you are in a hybrid environment make sure your mailbox was already migrated to Exchange Online
errorMessages.outdatedData: The settings you are trying to save have been modified elsewhere. Please reload the page and try again.
errorMessages.tooBigAttachmentsMessage: It is currently only supported to upload attachments of up to ~2.5MB in total. We are working to also support larger attachments.

unlinkConfirmationDropdown.unlinkConversationDescription: Unlink currently {{amount}} emails and all future replies.
unlinkConfirmationDropdown.unlinkConversationDescriptionSingle: Unlink currently 1 email and all future replies.
unlinkConfirmationDropdown.unlinkMessageFromConversationDescription: Other emails are still linked to this issue.
unlinkConfirmationDropdown.unlinkMultiDisclaimer: The emails themselves in Outlook are unaffected.
unlinkConfirmationDropdown.unlinkSingleDisclaimer: The email itself in Outlook is unaffected.

unlinkConfirmationModal.unlinkConversationDescription: Unlink the whole conversation with currently {{amount}} emails and all future replies.
unlinkConfirmationModal.unlinkConversationDescriptionSingle: Unlink the whole conversation with currently 1 email and all future replies.
unlinkConfirmationModal.unlinkMessageFromConversationDescription: Unlink this email. Other emails of the same conversation as well as future replies are still linked to this issue.
unlinkConfirmationModal.unlinkMultiDisclaimer: This will only remove the emails from this issue and will not affect the emails themselves in Outlook.
unlinkConfirmationModal.unlinkSingleDisclaimer: This will only remove the email from this issue and will not affect the email itself in Outlook.
unlinkConfirmationModal.heading: Remove linked email

templatePicker.noTemplatesGlobalAdminTooltip: No templates have been configured yet. You can create new templates in the global app settings or project settings.
templatePicker.noTemplatesProjectAdminTooltip: No templates have been configured yet. You can create new templates for your project in the project settings.
